name: Tower Jump (itch) (Saif)
description:
A fun game that consists of jumping and avoiding falling

Control the phone with arrows, one to the right and the other to the left

Click on the phone screen to jump the player to the top

There are three stages initially until I complete its development and increase the number of villas and features in them

The first and second stage in time When the time ends without the player falling, he wins, knowing that every few minutes the game increases in speed, the player must not lose his balance and fall

The third and final stage is jumping to infinity, which means avoiding falling

good luck for all
